title: Learner-Centered LMS-Based Science Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific theories and basic workplace experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on learner engagement and workplace-applicable scientific knowledge in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply scientific theories to real-world workplace cases via asynchronous discussion activities in LMS
Learners can interpret scientific concepts with 80% or higher accuracy using multimedia materials provided in mobile-optimized LMS environments
Learners can structure scientific thinking processes for workplace problem-solving in three or more stages through summative assessments at course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
